shape_4_per_frame6=

shape_4_per_frame8=
shape_4_per_frame9=vtx = vtx + tic*vv*vv*sign(vv);
shape_4_per_frame10=
shape_4_per_frame11=tex_zoom = 1/rad*tex_zoom;
shape_4_per_frame12=
shape_4_per_frame13=tex_cx = vtx*.1 - time*.1;
shape_4_per_frame14=

shape_4_per_frame19=

per_frame_1=warp = 0;
per_frame_2=
per_frame_3=tic = min(time-tin,.1);
per_frame_4=tin = time;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=vol = (bass_att + treb_att + mid_att)*.333333;
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=ra = 1/tic*.25;
per_frame_9=
per_frame_10=treb_avg = tic*(treb_avg*(1/tic - ra) + ra*treb);
per_frame_11=mid_avg = tic*(mid_avg*(1/tic - ra) + ra*mid);
per_frame_12=bass_avg = tic*(bass_avg*(1/tic - ra) + ra*bass);
per_frame_13=vav = tic*(vav*(1/tic - ra) + ra*(bass+treb+mid)*.33333);
per_frame_14=
per_frame_15=tt = tt + tic*treb;
per_frame_16=mt = mt + tic*mid;
per_frame_17=bt = bt + tic*bass;
per_frame_18=vt = vt + tic*vav;
per_frame_19=
per_frame_20=q1 = tt*4;
per_frame_21=q2 = mt*4;
per_frame_22=q3 = bt*4;
per_frame_23=
per_frame_24=st = .5;
per_frame_25=q4 = treb_avg*treb_avg*st;
per_frame_26=q5 = mid_avg*mid_avg*st;
per_frame_27=q6 = bass_avg*bass_avg*st;
per_frame_28=q4 = treb_avg*st;
per_frame_29=q5 = mid_avg*st;
per_frame_30=q6 = bass_avg*st;
per_frame_31=
per_frame_32=
per_frame_33=//ob_r = .5 + .5*sin(time);
per_frame_34=//ob_g = .5 + .5*sin(time + 1.0472);
per_frame_35=//ob_b = .5 + .5*sin(time + 2.0944);
per_pixel_1=ti = time*.3;
per_pixel_2=
per_pixel_3=mx = x - .5 + .5*sin(ti*1.1278);
per_pixel_4=my = y - .5 + .5*sin(ti*.9454);
per_pixel_5=mod = (1-2*above(-mx,my))*(1-2*above(mx,my));
per_pixel_6=dx = .5*(1-mod)*mx*sin(mx*6.2832*4 - sign(mx)*q1)*q4*(1-2*above(-mx,my));
per_pixel_7=dy = .5*(mod+1)*my*sin(my*6.2832*4 - sign(my)*q1)*q4*(1-2*above(-mx,my));
per_pixel_8=
per_pixel_9=mx = x - .5 + .5*sin(ti*1.3488);
per_pixel_10=my = y - .5 + .5*sin(ti*.7366);
per_pixel_11=mod = (1-2*above(-mx,my))*(1-2*above(mx,my));
per_pixel_12=dx = dx + .5*(1-mod)*mx*sin(mx*6.2832*4 - sign(mx)*q2)*q5*(1-2*above(-mx,my));
per_pixel_13=dy = dy + .5*(mod+1)*my*sin(my*6.2832*4 - sign(my)*q2)*q5*(1-2*above(-mx,my));
per_pixel_14=
per_pixel_15=mx = x - .5 + .5*sin(ti*1.3544);
per_pixel_16=my = y - .5 + .5*sin(ti*.9021);
per_pixel_17=mod = (1-2*above(-mx,my))*(1-2*above(mx,my));
per_pixel_18=dx = dx + .5*(1-mod)*mx*sin(mx*6.2832*4 - sign(mx)*q3)*q6*(1-2*above(-mx,my));
per_pixel_19=dy = dy + .5*(mod+1)*my*sin(my*6.2832*4 - sign(my)*q3)*q6*(1-2*above(-mx,my));
